poemsDataJson.list_full: 今(いま)来(こ)むと 言(い)ひしばかりに 長月(ながつき)の 有明(ありあけ)の月(つき)を 待(ま)ち出(い)でつるかな
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Just because she said//"In a moment I will come",//I've awaited her//Until the moon of daybreak,//In the long month, has appeared.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Ima kon to|Iishi bakari ni|Naga-tsuki no|Ariake no tsuki o|Machi ide tsuru kana
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ありあけのつきを まちいてつるかな
poemsDataJson.author: 素性法師(そせいほうし)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 約束しながら来なかった男への恨み言
